moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze adjacent Pokemon.
moves.name: Discharge

moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.name: Shock Wave

moves.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
moves.shortDesc: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.
moves.name: Laser Focus

moves.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.
moves.name: Attract

ability.shortDesc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.
moves.name: Solar Beam

moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
moves.name: Shadow Ball

moves.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.

moves.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
moves.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.
moves.name: Odor Sleuth

moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

ability.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack.
ability.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's attacking stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.

moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
moves.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.
moves.name: Hidden Power

moves.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.
moves.name: Endure

moves.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.
moves.name: Helping Hand
